entry.title: "This blog has moved!"
entry.summary:
- "thoughts"

Hello, dear reader.

I'm moving this blog to a new location, since I cannot continue to maintain the old www.glare.it one. I think that this change will mean an improved readability to you, and an ease of management to me.

The new blog address is http://iagosbar â€¦
entry.content:
- "thoughts"

Hello, dear reader.

I'm moving this blog to a new location, since I cannot continue to maintain the old www.glare.it one. I think that this change will mean an improved readability to you, and an ease of management to me.

The new blog address is http://iagosbar.wordpress.com. But if you're reading this message, you're done, you're on the good site :-)
